hero.title: Anticipating the World’s Crises
hero.subtitle: — before they collide and cascade.

mission.title: Crises Don’t Stand Alone.
paragraphs: Energy shocks fuel conflict. Conflict spreads disease. Health crises destabilize economies. Yet global response remains fragmented.
The Global Nexus Institute (GNI) connects these dots — integrating energy, geopolitics, and health into a unified framework for resilience and equity.
mission.caption: A connected world demands connected intelligence — and collective action.

initiatives.title: Turning Foresight into Collective Impact.
initiatives.subtitle: Two flagship programs translating foresight into measurable change.

projects.title: Global Chokepoints
projects.description: Mapping global chokepoints in energy, trade, and health — using data modeling to predict how disruptions spread and how resilience can be built.

projects.title: Energy Transition Health Index (ETHI)
projects.description: Developing an index that measures how national energy transitions affect public health, equity, and air quality.

people.name: Favoud Ahmad
people.title: CEO
people.bio: Favoud Ahmad has led cross-border initiatives bridging energy, trade, and development. His work bridges institutional foresight with ground-level action, guiding partnerships with governments, NGOs, and research institutions.

people.name: Dr. Saied Froghi
people.title: Director of Global Health Policy
people.bio: Dr. Froghi is a physician and researcher with expertise in public health systems. He leads GNI’s health foresight agenda, aligning medical research with energy and policy data to prevent cross-system crises.

people.name: Advisory Council
people.title: Strategic Advisor
people.bio: GNI is establishing a council of senior advisors spanning energy, finance, security, and health — bringing interdisciplinary insight to global resilience.

pageContent.title: Energy Systems
pageContent.subtitle: Understanding global energy transitions and their cascading effects

sections.heading: Overview
sections.content: Energy systems form the backbone of modern civilization. Our research tracks the complex interplay between energy security, geopolitical stability, and public health outcomes.

sections.heading: Key Focus Areas
sections.content: We analyze energy transition pathways, renewable energy deployment, fossil fuel dependencies, and the health implications of energy choices across different regions.

pageContent.title: Geopolitics
pageContent.subtitle: Mapping the intersection of power, resources, and global stability

sections.heading: Strategic Analysis
sections.content: Geopolitical dynamics shape access to resources, health infrastructure, and crisis response capabilities. We provide foresight on emerging hotspots and systemic risks.

sections.heading: Regional Insights
sections.content: Our analysis covers energy corridors, supply chain vulnerabilities, and the geopolitical dimensions of health security and pandemic preparedness.

pageContent.title: Public Health
pageContent.subtitle: Connecting health outcomes to energy and geopolitical factors

sections.heading: Nexus Approach
sections.content: Public health doesn't exist in isolation. Energy transitions affect air quality. Conflicts disrupt healthcare. Economic shocks limit health investments. We connect the dots.

sections.heading: Research Areas
sections.content: Our work spans climate health impacts, pandemic preparedness, health system resilience, and the social determinants shaped by energy and geopolitical forces.

pageContent.title: Resilience
pageContent.subtitle: Building adaptive capacity in an interconnected world for now

sections.heading: Systems Thinking
sections.content: Resilience requires understanding how shocks propagate across energy, political, and health systems. We identify vulnerabilities and design interventions.

sections.heading: Practical Solutions
sections.content: From diversified energy portfolios to robust health infrastructure, we help decision-makers build systems that can withstand and adapt to cascading crises.

aboutUs.title: About the Global Nexus Institute
aboutUs.subtitle: Bridging energy, geopolitics, and health for sustainable global stability.
aboutUs.description: GNI is a research institute that bridges the gap between academic insights and practical policy implementation. We focus on the critical intersections of energy security, geopolitical stability, and global health outcomes.
aboutUs.mission: Our mission is to equip leaders and institutions with integrated intelligence to navigate complex global risks.
aboutUs.vision: We envision systems that anticipate shocks, adapt quickly, and promote sustainable well-being for all.
aboutUs.primaryDescription: Energy shocks fuel conflict. Conflict spreads disease. Health crises destabilize economies.
aboutUs.secondaryDescription: Yet global policy and research remain siloed. The Global Nexus Institute (GNI) exists to break those silos — integrating energy, geopolitics, and health into a single field of foresight and action.
aboutUs.missionStatement: We transform complexity into clarity, connecting global challenges into actionable intelligence for leaders who shape our future.
aboutUs.bottomMessage: A connected world demands connected intelligence
